trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_SEQ_00<tab>Maqali's son should have returned by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Chagur.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Maqali's son.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_TODO_02<tab>Report to Maqali.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_000<tab>Ah, if it isn't the khagan <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_001<tab>I am sorry to trouble you, but could I ask you to check on my son? I sent him to the Dawn Throne on an errand and he should have returned by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_002<tab>Word has it that there are some Oronir who resent the fact that our tribe triumphed in the Naadam. I worry that one of them may have done something to my boy.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_003<tab>Please ask Chagur as to my son's whereabouts. She should know if he is safe or not. I do hope I am worrying for nothing...
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_006<tab>Please ask Chagur as to my son's whereabouts. She should know if he is safe or not. I do hope I am worrying for nothing...
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_CHAGUR_000_010<tab>Ah, khagan. To what do we owe the pleasure?
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_CHAGUR_000_011<tab>Yes, Maqali's son was here just a short while ago. The last I saw he was heading westwards with some hunters.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_CHAGUR_000_012<tab>I do not imagine there is aught to worry about, but check on him by all means should you be concerned.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_CHAGUR_000_015<tab>I do not imagine there is aught to worry about, but check on him by all means should you be concerned. He was headed off to the west the last time I saw him.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_SON02803_000_020<tab><pant> <pant> I cannot continue. My hands are covered in blisters. Wait, you are the khagan, are you not? What brings you here?
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_SON02803_000_021<tab>Father was truly that worried? After completing my errand, I began talking with these hunters, and they invited me to train with them.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_BUDUGA02803_000_022<tab>I had always looked down on the Mol, but it was we who lost. There must be some secret to their strength. Come on, let us go another round!
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_SON02803_000_023<tab>My apologies but Father awaits my return. Perhaps I can join you again when my hands are not so sore. Thank you for the invitation.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_030<tab>Did you find my boy?
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_ORONIR02803_000_031<tab>He must be hiding his true strength from us. There is no way we could have been defeated by such a weak tribe.
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_BUDUGA02803_000_032<tab>I am still too weak!
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_040<tab>I just spoke with my son. I could not ask him too much as he was keen to hurry off and get his hands bandaged up. What exactly happened?
TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_041<tab>Ha ha, truly? No doubt the experience will serve him well.

TEXT_STMBDZ625_02803_MAQALI_000_042<tab>Perhaps that kind of training is exactly what he needs to become a strong warrior like yourself. He may not like it, but he shall need to suffer if he wants to grow stronger.
